text: The Union territory of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu, India consist of three districts. http://www.census2011.co.in/census/state/districtlist/daman+and+diu.html {| class="wikitable sortable" ! № !! title: List of districts of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu
